summary: Iteration 24 - Dashboard drill-down and new chart types testing. Backend: 13 passed, 1 skipped. Frontend: All features verified - 10 chart types in Chart Studio including Violin, Coefficient, Heatmap. Dashboard Builder shows drill-down code properly implemented.
critical_code_review_comments: DashboardBuilder.jsx Lines 100-102: drillDownFilters and drillDownSource state properly initialized
DashboardBuilder.jsx Lines 176-188: handleDrillDown function correctly extracts variable and value from chart click
DashboardBuilder.jsx Lines 885-903: Drill-down indicator card renders when drillDownSource is set with Clear button
DashboardBuilder.jsx fetchDashboardData (Lines 151): Combines regular filters with drill-down filters in API call
ChartStudio.jsx Lines 75-86: CHART_TYPES array has all 10 types including violin, coef, heatmap
ChartStudio.jsx Lines 378-485: All new chart types (violin, coef, heatmap) have proper rendering logic
analysis_routes.py Lines 1009-1066: Heatmap endpoint returns correlation matrix with proper structure
analysis_routes.py Lines 1077-1170: Violin endpoint returns distribution stats with percentiles
analysis_routes.py Lines 1181-1265: Coefficient endpoint returns regression results with CI using statsmodels
seed_data_creation: No test data created. Existing test dashboards (TEST_Dashboard_Iter19) used for verification.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Dashboard drill-down and new chart types fully verified. Charts tab shows 10 chart types: Bar, Horizontal Bar, Pie, Donut, Line, Area, Scatter, Violin Plot, Coefficient Plot, Heatmap. Dashboard Builder component properly manages drillDownFilters state and shows drill-down indicator when filter is active. Backend endpoints for heatmap (/api/analysis/charts/heatmap), violin (/api/analysis/charts/violin), and coefficient (/api/analysis/charts/coefficient) all respond correctly with appropriate data structures.

dashboard_drilldown.drilldown_state_management: PASS - drillDownFilters and drillDownSource in state
dashboard_drilldown.handleDrillDown_function: PASS - Extracts variable/value from chart click
dashboard_drilldown.drilldown_indicator_ui: PASS - Shows card with filter info and Clear button
dashboard_drilldown.combined_filters_api: PASS - fetchDashboardData combines regular + drill-down filters
